mapper.delete: delete from registration where model_category_id=#{modelCategoryId} and date=#{date}
mapper.select: select r.registration_id,r.status,r.visit_start_time,r.visit_end_time,c.category_name ,c.fee ,r.date from registration r join category c on r.category_id=c.category_id where r.date =#{date} and r.doctor_id=#{doctorId} order by r.visit_start_time asc

select r.registration_id, d.name as doctor_name,c.category_name ,c.fee,r.date,r.visit_start_time,r.visit_end_time ,r.status from registration r join doctor d on r.doctor_id=d.doctor_id join category c on r.category_id=c.category_id where r.patient_id=#{patientId} order by r.date desc ,r.visit_start_time asc

select r.registration_id, p.name as patient_name,c.category_name ,c.fee,r.date,r.visit_start_time,r.visit_end_time ,r.status from registration r left join patient p on r.patient_id=p.patient_id join category c on r.category_id=c.category_id where r.doctor_id=#{doctorId} order by r.date desc ,r.visit_start_time asc

select r.registration_id, p.name as patient_name,p.sex,p.phone,p.patient_id,p.no_show_count,p.id_number from registration r left join patient p on r.patient_id=p.patient_id where r.doctor_id=#{doctorId} and r.status != 0
